text: Hello, i have a problem with integrating a project done in HubSpot to local development, do someone have some time for a quick call? It its very important for me because it's a commercial project :skull_and_crossbones:

Hey all,
Is there a way to examine the request before serving the response?
Basically, im trying to find a way to dynamically decide which http response to return.
We developed something similar for our wordpress customers.
In wordpress i can easily inspect the request before any of my code actually run.
Tried searching for something similar in HubSpot but i can't find anything that seems to fit the description.
Any help is highly appreciated!
Thanks.
Hey <@U047QD70ENT> if you want you can grab time from the calendar in my bio

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
Is this for a serverless function?
